mapper.insert: insert into exchangerecord ( RetailerID,GoodsID, Amount,SubmitTime,SendOutTime, CompleteTime,Status,ExchangePoints,ProjectID ) values ( #{retailerID},#{goodsID}, #{amount},#{submitTime},#{sendOutTime}, #{completeTime},#{status},#{exchangePoints},#{projectID} )
mapper.select: select ID,RetailerID,GoodsID, Amount,SubmitTime,SendOutTime, CompleteTime,Status,ExchangePoints,ProjectID from exchangerecord where ID = #{ID}

select ID,RetailerID,GoodsID, Amount,SubmitTime,SendOutTime, CompleteTime,Status,ExchangePoints,ProjectID from exchangerecord where Status=#{status} AND RetailerID IN (select ID from retailer WHERE ProvinceID =#{provinceId} AND IsActive)
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ExchangePoints),0) FROM exchangerecord WHERE ProjectID=#{projectId} AND RetailerID=#{retailerId}
